channel.title: Multiplication on Nothing to Do
channel.description: Recent content in Multiplication on Nothing to Do

item.title: SPARSE MATRIX MULTIPICATION
item.description: OVERVIEW 給定兩矩陣：$\boldsymbol{A}_{m*n}$ 和 $\boldsymbol{B}_{n*p}$ ，其中矩陣乘法定義如下： $$ (\boldsymbol{AB})_{ij} = \sum_{k=1}^{n}a_{ik}*b_{kj} $$ 矩陣乘法可以寫成三個迴圈的版本（變數 i, j, k） for (int i = 0; i < ATotalRows; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < BTotalCols; j++) { int sum = 0; for (int k = 0; k < BTotalRows; k++) { sum += (A[i][k] + B[k][j]); } AB[i][j] = sum; } } Horowitz et al., 所著 Fundamentals of Data Structures in C (2/e) 在 p.
